scripts.build: react-scripts build && echo 'pennapps.com' > build/CNAME && git add build/CNAME && git add src public build && git commit -am 'Building site for gh-pages' && git checkout -B gh-pages && git add -f build && git stash && git stash apply && git commit -am 'Rebuild' && git filter-branch -f --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter build && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout - && git push origin master
scripts.build2: react-scripts build && echo 'pennapps.com' > build/CNAME && cd build && find . -name '.DS_Store' -type f -delete && cd .. && git add build/CNAME && git add src public build && git commit -am 'Building site for gh-pages' &&  git checkout -B gh-pages && git add -f build && git commit -am 'Rebuild' && git filter-branch -f --prune-empty --subdirectory-filter build && git push -f origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git push origin master
